snippet: The scorched remains of 13 bodies have been discovered at a border post that burned down near the Kazakh-Chinese border, an official with the country’s border service confirmed Thursday.
abstract: Scorched remains of 13 bodies are discovered at a border post that burned down near the Kazakh-Chinese border.
lead_paragraph: The scorched remains of 13 bodies have been discovered at a border post that burned down near the Kazakh-Chinese border, an official with the country’s border service confirmed Thursday.

headline.main: Kazakhstan: 13 Die at a Border Post
headline.print_headline: Kazakhstan: 13 Die at a Border Post
